lenders.name: Shelli

lenders.loan_because: Om Namah Shivaya

lenders.name: Lily
lenders.occupation: Mother and school psychology graduate student

lenders.occupational_info: A school school psychologist helps students with disabilities succeed in school.

lenders.name: Catherine

lenders.name: Madison
lenders.loan_because: I want to help make an impact in what may help save a persons life.

lenders.name: Tammy & Ken

lenders.name: Maureen

lenders.name: Shannon & Dave
lenders.loan_because: I can understand what it is like not having a lot. My husband and I just got married in August/07. We both do not make a lot of money, things are tight. I purchased gift certificates as Christmas gifts and they are the best presents I could ever give myself, and my family! Happy Holidays!
lenders.occupational_info: I am a grade 3/4 school teacher. My husband is a dairy farmer (he milks Holstein cows).

lenders.name: Peter
lenders.loan_because: I can, and it's the right thing.

lenders.name: Mitch

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: there is no reason not to loan.

lenders.name: gabe
lenders.occupational_info: im trying to start up a brand new clothing skateboarding line. new styles, that very from hip hop, to punk. hats, shirts, and when im comfertable enough to start making them. ill get to the denim wear. i really want this to happen. its been my dream to start a clothing line for skateboarding ever since i found out im not good enogh to get sponsored by a major skateboarding company.

lenders.name: Stephanie
lenders.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place, even if it's one small step at a time.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother of one son, and I work simply to earn enough money to keep my house and my car, otherwise I would spend every day with my son.

lenders.name: Roland
lenders.loan_because:
Being involved with Kiva allows me to do something that I've wanted to do - namely, microfinancing, but I didn't know how to do so. It makes sense for me to share my resources with other people in parts of the world I may never see. Doing so helps me to become familiar their lives and cultures. And, being a lender helps me in my quest to be a peaceful world citizen.

I also think that learning to share resources opens my heart up to God and acknowledges that my life should be lived in connection to a broad community.

Here is a link to an interview I did on being a Kiva lender: 
http://www.tavissmileyradio.com/guests09/071709/RolandAllen.html
lenders.occupational_info: I work with upper school students in an Episcopal school in southern California. I am the director of college counseling, and I teach a class in philosophy and ethics..

lenders.name: Marie Ringler
lenders.occupation: Member of Regional Parliament Vienna, Green Party
lenders.loan_because: Only if we in the "first world" share our riches, people in developing countries will have a chance to improve their lifes.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Member of the Regional Parliament of Vienna, Austria for the Green Party.

lenders.loan_because: We can and we know it works.

lenders.loan_because: i believe in inspiration realised

lenders.name: Mauro Javier Cardenas
lenders.loan_because: "There ought to be behind the door of every happy, contented man some one standing with a hammer continually reminding him with a tap that there are unhappy people; that however happy he may be, life will show him her laws sooner or later, trouble will come for him—disease, poverty, losses, and no one will see or hear, just as now he neither sees nor hears others." --Chekhov

I will be healed as I let Him teach me to heal." (T-2.V.18)

lenders.name: Laurette
lenders.loan_because: I come from a country that has lots of opportunities for anyone willing to work hard.  I want to help anyone that has that same drive and determination, but just needs a little help to reach their goals and build a business.  It's just a small way of reaching out to our global community.
lenders.occupational_info: I worked for a finance company in the trucking industry.  The company moved their offices to Texas.  I decided to stay in Chicago and look for another position rather than transfer.

lenders.name: trixie
lenders.loan_because: i can make a difference in the lives of many people and be able to help others in any way that i can.

lenders.name: bruce
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance at a better life
lenders.occupational_info: help in the management of inpatients in hospital

lenders.name: FRAN
lenders.loan_because: I am also an entrepreneur, I have set up and funded myself from scratch my little business. It has been a hard way till now, and it still a difficult way, even in our western contries where theorically the access to resources is easier, and I feel a particular proximity with people from far away that have the same desires, dreams and needs for creating their own business to earn from. Even if my aportation if small and symbolic, it's a manner to create some solidarity.
lenders.occupational_info: I am the owner of a little company, we manufacture in Europe and trade worlwide adhesive projection screens. It is specific product in a technical market, and Internet is for us a natural playground and a unique opportunity to be in touch with customers worldwide. So we like the Kiva project that connects lender from anywhere in the world to business owners form very far in the same world. it's a gret idea !

lenders.name: KAPES "FamilyProjects"
lenders.loan_because: Every person's life has value, so we  should help people get what they need to make their lives better.
lenders.occupational_info: FamilyProjects is made up of family members that live in several areas of the USA with a common goal of helping others.

lenders.name: Sheryl
lenders.occupational_info: I work with children/teenagers who need emotional support due to having suffered trauma in their childhood.

lenders.name: Regina
lenders.loan_because: I am inspired to give back to a world that has blessed me.  I believe everyone has a chance in life.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in career services to assist students in preparing professionally for the workforce after graduation from college

lenders.name: Phil & Kathleen
lenders.loan_because: We feel these loans encourage and empower those most in need in our world community

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others be self sufficient.
lenders.occupational_info: I am in sixthgrade. I love to design websites. I also program in Java and c++. I just like to do things like that. I also play soccer.

lenders.name: Janis
lenders.loan_because: It's a wonderful feeling to help people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: Jewelry business

lenders.name: Daneshvar Family
lenders.loan_because:
This is one of the ways that we can "share".  We are blessed with family, friends, and health. We loan because we want to and can.  We loan because it is one way to help someone get their start so as to be able to provide for their family to have what we have become accustomed to: food on the table, roof over our heads, clothes on our backs.
WE NOW LOAN IN THE NAME OF OUR SON, REZA, WHO DIED JULY 24, 2012. To help those who are earthbound as he will now help us from above.
lenders.occupational_info: My husband is a business man who has a medical center in the Bronx. I am a mom of 5 and a  retired nurse.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: Working with entrepreneurs gives me juice!  I am grateful for the abundance and prosperity we all share as ONE mind.
lenders.occupational_info: We help people successfully navigate transformations in career, wellness and spirt. I encourage you to learn more about yourself with a coach as your guide. Commit to Invest in yourself!

lenders.name: Rod
lenders.loan_because: I loan because I want to help make the world a better place for all people.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with our partners to ensure that processes are in place  to resolve technical support issues.

lenders.name: Burke
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled and worked for the last 20 years in the developing world, and so I realize that I have been very lucky in having good opportunities in life such as education and employment.  I believe people such as myself all have a responsibility to help our brothers and sisters in other lands,  wherever and how best we can. I also know how important it is that people don't become dependent on help from outside, but rather, that they retain a strong belief in themselves and a sense of initiative. Microfinance mechanisms like Kiva are one of the kinds of thing that works. Good luck and don't ever let anything stop you from believing in yourself, and that by succeeding, you can also help your communities.
lenders.occupational_info: I manage a scientific network that helps scientists from different areas of the Asia-Pacific region to work together on common problems (like climate change, health issues, etc.). I'm also an owner of a small business.

lenders.name: Francie
lenders.loan_because:
Everyone deserves the opportunity to provide a good life for themselves and their families.  Our individual lives are globally linked, no matter how far apart we may be geographically.  The  peace and health of our planet depend on understanding and supporting our shared humanity.  
These donations are made in honor of my sisters, Carol and Scootie, and in gratitude for the friendship and blessings that we share. 
Many thanks to the dedicated individuals at Kiva for providing this opportunity to make a difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I work with the Internet and with computer images for my state's environmental protection agency.

lenders.name: Phoeby
lenders.loan_because: paying my rent to the universe
lenders.occupational_info: I teach yoga and ESL (English as a Second Language).

lenders.name: Cat
lenders.loan_because: I want to help others succeed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at this time.

lenders.name: Eliza
lenders.loan_because: I like helping others who are not as fortunate as I am. I realize that I am very blessed, and I love trying my best to help others feel blessed.

lenders.name: Del
lenders.loan_because: i am lucky. I want for nothing and have a decent job, home and life. I now want to give something back, to other individuals who can obtain some benefit. its coming up to christmas, and these are the best gifts i could recieve.
lenders.occupational_info: i work with people experiencing mental illness, in a large city in the north of england.

lenders.name: Gehrig
lenders.loan_because: I like helping people in need.
lenders.occupational_info: I am an elementary school student.

lenders.name: Deborah
lenders.loan_because: I believe that we should all give back, as we receive so many of life's rich blessings in so many small ways every day.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a mother and a doctor - both exciting and worthwhile occupations.

lenders.name: James
lenders.loan_because:
The concept behind Kiva.org intrigued me, as a much of my job is related to the provision of business services to small business start-ups.   Finding a mechanism to help transform the lives of others by donating small sums to those willing to take on the challenge of business under some of the most difficult of conditions is great and I’m pleased to play a small part.

I recently heard a quote that expresses some of what I feel “The great thing in this world is not so much where we stand, as in what direction we are moving." (Oliver Wendell Holmes) being part of this project takes me a step in a direction I rather like.
lenders.occupational_info: I provide business support services to established, start-up businesses and the general public. A one stop shop for everything.

lenders.name: Emma
lenders.loan_because: i can. :)

lenders.name: Sue
lenders.loan_because: I feel lucky to have opportunities.  I would like to help others who may not have the same opportunities.

lenders.name: Mike and Lisa
lenders.loan_because: We hope it will help someone else realize their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info:
Mike helps banks protect their internet systems from hackers.
Lisa's job is to analyze business service needs her company provides to banks.

lenders.name: Jason
lenders.loan_because: The Lord has blessed me with more than I need for myself and my family.  It is truly a gift that keeps on giving.  As money is repaid. it can be used by others.

lenders.name: Josi
lenders.occupation: Coordinator at a trade show company

lenders.name: Clare & Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I want to show my son how little contributions can make a big difference.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a realtor, licensed in MD and DC. I help people buy and sell homes.

lenders.name: Bilkis
lenders.loan_because: A little helping hand goes a long way

lenders.name: Judy
lenders.loan_because: I was fortunate to be born in a country with plenty. If the world market can not share the wealth maybe individuals can.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a reading teacher on an Apache Indian Reservation in AZ, USA. Being able to read gives children choices in life.

lenders.name: Wee-Gee
lenders.loan_because:
Micro-Loans to small businesses tend to have a greater and longer lasting impact to the entrepreneur and his/her community than simply giving it away ---> A hand-up (training, planning, micro-loan, accountability and support) is far better than a hand-out. The hand-up approach promotes self-reliance and financial independence which leads to development and progress. Conversely, hand-outs encourage continued dependence on the giver. Just as the old Chinese proverb says, "Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. But  teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime..........(I add) and if you teach his wife to fish, the whole family eats for a lifetime."
http://www.globalissues.org/article/26/poverty-facts-and-stats

lenders.name: Joe &  Jimmy
lenders.loan_because: I value the opportunity to teach my grandchildren that when you share you help, and when you help you appreciate!

lenders.loan_because: In  memory of Bob Vaughn
lenders.occupational_info: I  paint on wood, paper and canvas using a variety of mediums.

lenders.name: Robyn
lenders.loan_because: I love.

lenders.name: Michelle
lenders.loan_because: I have a very good life and feel very lucky to have the life that I do. I have a life rich with love and laughter. If my giving a small amount of money to help someone else improve their life means that they are able to love easier and laugh more then I am able to share a part of my life with that person; even if that person is half way around the world.

lenders.occupational_info: To build a cohesive work environment by helping employees understand each others viewpoints, perspectives, goals and concerns. /I manage our home now that I'm unemployed, and look for employment outside of the home; just guess which is easier.

lenders.loan_because: As MBA students at Mills, we recognize the impact of microfinancing  on the global economy.  We also like helping people become self sufficient and successful in their businesses and lives.
lenders.occupational_info: We study hard and have lots of fun working on group projects in Lisa Cain's Monday night marketing management class.

lenders.name: Scott & Staci
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that may not be able to get a loan in the normal fashion.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a Foot & Ankle Surgeon, and my wife is a Stay At Home Mom.

lenders.name: Eric
lenders.loan_because:
To quote Harold Melvin and the Blue Notes: "The world won't get no better, if we just let it be
The world won't get no better, we gotta change it yeah, just you and me." -Wake Up Everybody
lenders.occupational_info: I teach English and World History to students who are 12,13, and 14 years of age.

lenders.name: Alex
lenders.occupation: I work to help victims of identity theft
lenders.loan_because:
I have been fortunate in my life to have been afforded the privilege to assist others.  It is with this privilege that I feel obligated to help others by spanning across any boundary, border or culture.

And besides, as Oprah put it, Kiva is ADDICTIVE!
lenders.occupational_info:
Lived in New York City for 19 years and now live back in New Jersey.  I am of Portuguese heritage.  I travel globally frequently and appreciate various cultures.  I enjoy rollerblading, theater, baseball and you will most likely find me on a beach when the weather is warm.

Words to live by:

-Each of us are angels with only one wing, and we can only fly by embracing one another. 
  
-The only thing you take with you when you're gone is what you leave behind.

-It is only with the heart that one can see rightly.  What is essential is invisible to the eye. 

-We may not share the same religious faith but we share the same human faith.

-Someone is sitting in the shade today because someone planted a tree a long time ago. 

-Man has been endowed with reason, with the power to create, so that he can add to what he's been given.

-Go out on a limb.  That's where the fruit is.

-In order to succeed in life, one must not be afraid to fail.

-Pray as if everything depended on God, and work as if everything depended on man. 

-Let us realize that the privilege to work is a gift, the power to work is a blessing, the love of work is success!

aricardo@yahoo.com

lenders.name: fabian
lenders.loan_because: We loan because we believe in helping others achieve the best in their life.

lenders.name: Kate
lenders.loan_because: I love to hear the stories that people have to tell as well as learn more about the people and places around the world whom I don't get to meet and see first-hand.
lenders.occupational_info: My job is my passion. I help people to feel better and more attuned with their bodies. Connecting so directly with another human being for an hour or so at a time is an absolutely  unique experience in our culture and I am dearly thankful I have found my path.

lenders.name: Beth
lenders.occupational_info: Registered Nurse

lenders.name: Suz
lenders.loan_because: We have been blessed with such abundance in our country and I believe we need to share these gifts with the world. Why else would it have been given to us? Uplifting others is Holy work.

lenders.name: Jeff & Sandi
lenders.loan_because: I can.  What greater joy could there be than to help people around the world reach their dreams?
lenders.occupational_info: Jeff helps negotiate treaties with indigenous peoples.  Sandi teaches children who need extra help learning to read.

lenders.loan_because: I am in first grade, and want to use my allowance for charity.  I want to treat others the way I want to be treated.
lenders.occupational_info: I love being a student in my teacher's class.

lenders.name: Julia
lenders.loan_because: "I expect to pass through life but once. If, therefore, there is any kindness I can show, or any good thing I can do to any fellow being, let me do it now, and not defer or neglect it, as I shall not pass this way again."

lenders.name: Ellen & Rick
lenders.loan_because: My husband and I want to help others succeed in their business endeavors.  We want to give back to my husband's birth country of Peru.

lenders.name: Conon
lenders.loan_because: As I work in finance with banks, I cannot find a better way to help people in other countries to have a better life.  These micro loans provide these people to help their families and community.  I'm glad to be part of this.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as an accountant for banks.  I show how the company is doing in certain financial products.

lenders.loan_because: To help others achieve economic independence, and provide for their families by sharing my belief in their success through giving.

lenders.loan_because: We want to make a difference in this world.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people plan their financial future by advising them to make sound investment decisions in stocks, bonds and real estate.  Vicki is a flight attendant for a major airline and gets to visit all corners of the earth.

lenders.loan_because: I think it's a great way to help others. I would just spend the money on something stupid!

lenders.occupational_info: I'm an entrepreneur and adviser to senior executives on business development and marketing.

lenders.name: Papa & Alyssa
lenders.loan_because:
I do not have the means to empower anyone, but if my small loan can help someone empower themselves, then I have done the right thing.
Proverbs 19:17   Whoever is generous to the poor lends to the Lord, and he will repay him for his deed.
lenders.occupational_info: I am including my beautiful Granddaughter Alyssa in this endeavor with the hope to teach her that we should not take Gods gifts for granted.

lenders.name: Roma
lenders.loan_because: people should be able to choose their own destinies.

lenders.name: debbie
lenders.loan_because: I WANT TO SHARE AND ENABLE OTHERS TO PROVIDE, AND THEN BE ABLE TO SHARE TOO.

lenders.name: Neal
lenders.loan_because:
I believe in people who are opportunistic and entrepreneurial, and I am inspired by individuals who refuse to let their inherited circumstances limit their livelihood. 

Most importantly, I loan because I am moved by and forever grateful for Jesus Christ's captivating and relentless love.
lenders.occupational_info: I work through all phases of purchasing and selling companies.

lenders.name: Patrick
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those who are trying to have a better life
lenders.occupational_info: working for all the directors of the company keeps me busy 24/7.

lenders.name: Kent and Sally
lenders.loan_because: I can
lenders.occupational_info: Teach/write/worry/play intl chess/mess around in my too big yard.

lenders.name: Brigitte
lenders.loan_because:
As a person and artist I know how hard it is to follow a dream.  
Therefore I sometimes wonder what the most important thing of being here on earth could be. 
Perhaps it is our interaction with each other... and the real meaning of life might be how we teach and learn from each other...
In essence... how we treat each other, most importantly our family and close friends.  
Next, is how we treat everyone else that we encounter along our life’s path and I think our goal should be to have a positive impact on every person we meet... to be patient and kind, to impart our knowledge, to bring a smile to ones face and to learn from each experience.

lenders.name: Tadej Brdnik
lenders.occupation: Principal Dancer, Teacher, Manager of Special Projects
lenders.loan_because: I want to help change other people's lives.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm been fortunate enough in my life to have others who have helped me on my path to success so nothing gives me greater joy than to assist those who are trying to makes a difference in their own lives.

lenders.name: Kevin
lenders.loan_because: I know what it's like to have nothing. This is a small amount of money that gives a great deal of hope to people.

lenders.occupational_info: I am the carer for my disabled son. I try to give him as full a life as possible.
